greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = product of next n even numbers beginning with n if n is even, otherwise product of next n odd numbers beginning with n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..350
formula: a(n) = 2^n*Gamma(3*n/2)/Gamma(n/2). Column 2 of A303489. - _Peter Bala_, Jan 12 2020
program: (PARI) for(n=1,25, print1(prod(k=0,n-1, n+2*k), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 30 2017
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Nov 03 2005
ext: More terms from Tracy Poff (tracy.poff(AT)gmail.com), Dec 31 2005
